name: Linear Regression
short_description: Calculate the linear regression based on the chosen period by drawing a channel with which to interpret the trend.

params.title: Linear Regression x.x.x.
params.content: The name, version, and link to find references for this tool

params.title: Period
params.content: The number of bars for the regression calculation

params.title: Color
params.content: You can choose the color of the channel

params.title: Line
params.content: You can choose the thickness of the channel lines

params.title: Standard deviation
params.content: You can choose whether to display the standard deviation

params.title: Center
params.content: You can choose whether to display the center of channel

params.title: Channel
params.content: You can choose whether to display the extern line of channel
